textTab: Michelin chefs would, of course, choose Rossini Caviar... Checkmate designed a developed a unified global brand website and B2C store in a scalable open-source solution.
Runestone is a graduation project we did for our last year in VFX School (Haute-Ecole Albert Jacquard) in Belgium.

Runestone is about a magical world plunged into darkness and whose only way out is to acquire a lost rune stone to try to save the world. We follow the adventure of a magician who has received the call to perform this task.

It was a great experience and we learned a huge amount of things during this work. As we were only 2, we did both the modelling, texturing, lighting, compositing etc but Martin Hor√© specialized in FX and I did the sculpting and animation.
This project has been done in Blender using the Cycles render engine and the FX were done in Mantra, Houdini. Enjoy ! :)
